fields.Title: WHIRLING / BATHROOM MIRROR
fields.Description: A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall, above a bent and broken sink.

fields.Title: You: "Attempt to stop *The Expression* fr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Attempt to stop *The Expression* from happening.

fields.Title: You: "Okay..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay...

fields.Title: Mirror: "Whatever it is, at least it's dead..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whatever it is, at least it's dead now. There's clearly rigor mortis on your face. Or wait... is that an *expression*? Are you trying to make an expression with that face?

fields.Title: Mirror: "Maybe that's how it started? And no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe that's how it started? And now it doesn't even matter anymore -- you've worn that grin into your face and it will never come *off*...

fields.Title: Volition: "You couldn't stop if you wanted to...."
fields.Dialogue Text: You couldn't stop if you wanted to. It's neurological.

fields.Title: Shivers: "In a rundown shack on the far coast..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In a rundown shack on the far coast, a middle-aged man pounds his fist and looses an animal cry as he stares into a sliver of clouded glass...

fields.Title: Endurance: "It was time to banish that ridiculo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It was time to banish that ridiculous *Expression* from your face -- and replace it with a perfect reflection of your unyielding resolve, your noble suffering.

fields.Title: You: "Even love?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Even love?

fields.Title: Endurance: "Br√∂ther. You *have* succeeded..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Br√∂ther. You *have* succeeded...

fields.Title: Endurance: "This idiocy has gone on too long. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This idiocy has gone on too long. It's time to wipe that decadent homo-sexual grin off your face.

fields.Title: You: "It was just a reflex!"
fields.Dialogue Text: It was just a reflex!

fields.Title: Mirror: "The bathroom mirror has been wiped..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bathroom mirror has been wiped completely clean. You see the reflection of your face in the mirror -- such as it is without *The Expression*. It's just hairy.

fields.Title: You: "I don't care. (Still wipe the mirro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't care. (Still wipe the mirror.)
fields.Alternate1: I don't care, I hurt myself, it's what I do. (Wipe the mirror.)

fields.Title: You: "I think it might be because I'm a s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I think it might be because I'm a superstar.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Abort! You clearly have not thought..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Abort! You clearly have not thought this through. You won't like what you will see there -- and you will never *un-become* it.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "No-no, not the voice! Make it stop...."
fields.Dialogue Text: No-no, not the voice! Make it stop...

fields.Title: Endurance: "Now open your eyes and witness the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now open your eyes and witness the wonder! The HMS Last Kingsman has left the docks. The world will tremble as you smash all the ice in the world.

fields.Title: Endurance: "It's time. Time to see yourself as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's time. Time to see yourself as you truly are. It's going to be absolutely *devastating*, but there's no way to avoid it.

fields.Title: Endurance: "It's time. Time to see yourself as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's time. Time to see yourself as you truly are. It's going to be absolutely *devastating*, but there's no way to avoid it.

fields.Title: Endurance: "It turns out you've already been we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It turns out you've already been wearing your *true* face. The face of The Loser. The face of He Who Could Not Handle It. Now, get out of your sight.

fields.Title: Mirror: "You *can't*, can you? It's like it'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You *can't*, can you? It's like it's not even voluntary anymore. You have worn that grin into your face and now it won't come *off*...

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Sometimes you like to add finger pi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sometimes you like to add finger pistols to the mix, because unlike Guillaume le Million you are a police officer. It's your nifty little way to say: I'm armed and dangerous.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "You have some understanding of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You have some understanding of the recent history of disco. The rest is darkness.
fields.Alternate1: You have some understanding of the near history of disco. The rest is darkness, aside from the useless fact that the motor carriage outside was a Coupris Kineema.

fields.Title: Mirror: "Oh my god, you *can't* stop! It's l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh my god, you *can't* stop! It's like it's not even voluntary anymore! You have worn that grin into your face and now it won't come off...

fields.Title: You: "Lets just get it over with. Wipe th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lets just get it over with. Wipe the mirror.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Can't hear you over the moans of yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Can't hear you over the moans of your w√∂men. They writhe in pleasure as the foreigners are playing them like instruments. Be careful, or they'll wear you like a sock, Harry.

fields.Title: You: "Pull the imaginary lever."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pull the imaginary lever.

fields.Title: You: "Wait, why do I need to do that?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, why do I need to do that?

fields.Title: You: "What's going on? I thought I *succe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What's going on? I thought I *succeeded*!

fields.Title: You: "What's too much?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's too much?

fields.Title: You: "It's never not too late! I can *sti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's never not too late! I can *still* turn it back...

fields.Title: Endurance: "Yes. It *should* be awful, because..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. It *should* be awful, because you failed. Failing is weakness and weakness is awful. That is the way of the world...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "It's like something snaps in you --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's like something snaps in you -- a nerve ending, a thought, a sadness. Your face in the mirror is suddenly clean of the leer that had distorted it for god knows how long.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "It's like something snaps in you --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's like something snaps in you -- a nerve ending, a thought, a sadness. Your face in the mirror is suddenly clean of the leer that had distorted it. For god knows how long...

fields.Title: You: "It's an expression of pain."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's an expression of pain.

fields.Title: You: "I promise."
fields.Dialogue Text: I promise.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Out of the dazzling swirl of disco..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Out of the dazzling swirl of disco music, in an open air *bo√Æte de nuit* somewhere in Revachol West, Guillaume's blond mane appeared on the screen. He sang some bullshit. Then he made *The Expression*.

fields.Title: You: "Anything else? Like who am I? Why d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Anything else? Like who am I? Why did I drink myself into oblivion?
fields.Alternate1: Anything else? Like who am I? Why did I become a cop? Why did I drink myself into oblivion?

fields.Title: You: "I am ready."
fields.Dialogue Text: I am ready.

fields.Title: Endurance: "While the world burns, the two of y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: While the world burns, the two of you, together again, ride an aerostatic into the sunset. Maybe it will work this time? Spare Revachol and you'll never hear from her again. Will you sacrifice a second chance at love to keep Revachol safe?

fields.Title: You: "I may as well give up then..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I may as well give up then...

fields.Title: Endurance: "Enough. The Franconigerian Court of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Enough. The Franconigerian Court of Honour has held your naked soul up against the Sevenfold Sun Miracle and looked right through it. Close your eyes and *know*, this is who you are:

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Hey! It took a minor neurological *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hey! It took a minor neurological *miracle* to get your face to this point!

fields.Title: Mirror: "A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall. It's barely covered in steam anymore. You see yourself -- *The Expression* fixed to your clean-shaven face. You're still not accustomed to it.

fields.Title: You: "Of course I do. It's... uhm... is i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course I do. It's... uhm... is it some kind of superstar? I think I'm a superstar.

fields.Title: You: "God, I don't know -- it's indescrib..."
fields.Dialogue Text: God, I don't know -- it's indescribable.

fields.Title: You: "I'm outta here. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm outta here. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Logic: "Probably not, no."
fields.Dialogue Text: Probably not, no.

fields.Title: You: "How bad could it be?"
fields.Dialogue Text: How bad could it be?

fields.Title: Drama: "If it doesn't rhyme, you're not pro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If it doesn't rhyme, you're not pronouncing it right.

fields.Title: You: "How long ago was The New?"
fields.Dialogue Text: How long ago was The New?

fields.Title: Mirror: "It doesn't have to be. You can swoo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It doesn't have to be. You can swoon over Guillaume and his champagne-cork smile whenever you want to... Maybe some of the stardust will return?

fields.Title: You: "Hold on, my cocksmanship is on par..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hold on, my cocksmanship is on par with...!

fields.Title: Endurance: "*Never*. May this serve as a consta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Never*. May this serve as a constant reminder of your sacred, un-put-downable burthen.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Love... time... Revachol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Love... time... Revachol...

fields.Title: You: "All of it?"
fields.Dialogue Text: All of it?

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "He sets down the paper and quickly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He sets down the paper and quickly scribbles the date and time in his notebook, along with a note: 'HDB possible relapse? Check in first thing.'

fields.Title: Endurance: "Now shout from the top of your lung..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now shout from the top of your lungs: YOU ARE THE NOBLE SUFFERER.

fields.Title: Mirror: "You liar. You can't even tell the t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You liar. You can't even tell the truth to yourself. Go ahead, try something!

fields.Title: You: "Really? Nothing?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Really? Nothing?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The click is used to spur on a hors..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The click is used to spur on a horse. It also features heavily in Guillaume Le Million's regional mega-hit "Don't Worry (Your Pretty Little Head)".

fields.Title: Endurance: "It's all shit."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's all shit.

fields.Title: You: "(Bow down.) Yes. My heart forever b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Bow down.) Yes. My heart forever beats for Revachol, I am all she has left. The constant kingsman.

fields.Title: You: "It can't be."
fields.Dialogue Text: It can't be.

fields.Title: You: "Wait, what happened to my face?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, what happened to my face?

fields.Title: Endurance: "Face it, br√∂ther. No one's got the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Face it, br√∂ther. No one's got the *willpower* to set things right. They won't do what it takes.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Now open your eyes and witness the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now open your eyes and witness the (small) wonder! The HMS Modest Kingsman has left the docks. You are neither the greatest nor the strongest icebreaker on the seas, but you are what you are.

fields.Title: Endurance: "It's time. Time to see yourself as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's time. Time to see yourself as you truly are. It's going to be absolutely *devastating*, but there's no way to avoid it.

fields.Title: Endurance: "This idiocy has gone on too long. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This idiocy has gone on too long. It's time to wipe that decadent homo-sexual grin off your face.

fields.Title: Endurance: "It's time. Your efforts at avoiding..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's time. Your efforts at avoiding this moment have been truly *heroic*, but now there's nothing left but for you to confront yourself as you *truly* are, no matter the consequences...

fields.Title: Endurance: "Love... time... Revachol... all of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Love... time... Revachol... all of it. The pressure is putting you on your knees.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "The faucet is quite terribly mangle..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The faucet is quite terribly mangled, but you just might be able to twist its parts into place.

fields.Title: Mirror: "An old mirror hangs on the wall. Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An old mirror hangs on the wall. You see the reflection of your face in it -- such as it is without *The Expression*. It's just hairy.

fields.Title: Mirror: "A mirror hangs above a bent and bro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A mirror hangs above a bent and broken sink. In a fierce discharge of masculine energy someone has ripped half the faucet off.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "It's too late. Like an image on fil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's too late. Like an image on film, *The Expression* belongs to your primary motor cortex. It would take a minor neurological miracle for you to cease producing it.

fields.Title: You: "I'm pretty sure I can't stop."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm pretty sure I can't stop.

fields.Title: You: "Maybe I should touch it first, make..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe I should touch it first, make sure there's nothing *wrong* with my face.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "You'll plough your way toward the f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You'll plough your way toward the frigid lands of Katla and Vaasa, smashing every ice sheet in your path. Nothing, *nothing* can stop an icebreaker...

fields.Title: Endurance: "The problem is obvious: You simply..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The problem is obvious: You simply can't hack it. You're a failure. It's all *too much* for you.

fields.Title: Endurance: "This idiocy has gone on far too lon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This idiocy has gone on far too long. It's time to wipe that decadent homo-sexual grin off your face. Time to see yourself as you truly are.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Let this new face be a reminder, an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let this new face be a reminder, an unalterable mark of shame. This is the face of The Loser, the face of He Who Looks at Himself and Despairs. Now, get out of your sight.

fields.Title: Endurance: "It wasn't enough. You simply don't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It wasn't enough. You simply don't have what it *takes*...

fields.Title: You: "Wipe the mirror."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wipe the mirror.

fields.Title: You: "No way, I'm not doing this. [Back o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No way, I'm not doing this. [Back off.]

fields.Title: Mirror: "It's not. It's swollen and snail-li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not. It's swollen and snail-like, wriggling between your fingers.

fields.Title: Mirror: "Behold!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Behold!

fields.Title: Mirror: "What does it even *mean*? What is t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What does it even *mean*? What is the emotion you're trying to convey?

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Was this not the same *√©lan* that f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Was this not the same *√©lan* that founds empires and lays waste to cities, virile, uncaring towards *the little things*?

fields.Title: You: "Actually, I'm not sure I *can* stop..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Actually, I'm not sure I *can* stop.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Fine... The three of you, all toget..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fine... The three of you, all together, ride an aerostatic into the sunset. The question remains: Will you sacrifice love to keep Revachol safe?

fields.Title: Endurance: "We keep it buried like a horrible s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: We keep it buried like a horrible secret. We feed it through the cracks in the floorboards out of a sickening sense of nostalgia. Just enough to keep it alive. And yet it still comes to us in moments of weakness, unbidden, a source of shame and panic...

fields.Title: Endurance: "Despite doubt, fear, sentimentality..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Despite doubt, fear, sentimentality and weakness, you plough ever forward, like an icebreaker, tearing through the frigid North Sea.

fields.Title: Endurance: "It takes a true kingsman to summon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It takes a true kingsman to summon the *will* to face reality in all its darkness. To stare straight into the abyss and do *what must be done*.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Who said anything about giving up?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who said anything about giving up?

fields.Title: Endurance: "This idiocy has gone on too long. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This idiocy has gone on too long. It's time to wipe that decadent homo-sexual grin off your face.

fields.Title: You: "Not my w√∂men..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not my w√∂men...

fields.Title: Endurance: "No, it's *far* too late. All that r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, it's *far* too late. All that remains is for you to feel bad, because you failed, and there's nothing you can do about it. That is the way of the world...

fields.Title: Interfacing: "You handle the chaincutters deftly,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You handle the chaincutters deftly, applying just enough pressure. The faucet regains a recognizable shape. The steam stops.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "It belongs in The New -- the third..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It belongs in The New -- the third decade of the current century. Enough time had passed from the failure of Revolution that, for a fleeting moment, free market economy seemed like the ultimate, uncontested way of life for our species.

fields.Title: Mirror: "It appears you're also dead. There'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It appears you're also dead. There's clearly rigor mortis on your face, or wait... is that an *expression*? Are you trying to make an expression with that face? Why?

fields.Title: Mirror: "*Too* late. You clearly have rigor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Too* late. You clearly have rigor mortis on your face, or wait... is that an *expression*? Are you trying to make an expression with that face? Why?

fields.Title: You: "Does this have anything to do with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Does this have anything to do with Ostentatious Orchestrations?

fields.Title: Shivers: "A cold damp seeps in through the ga..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A cold damp seeps in through the gaps between the wall planks. There is no one to bear witness to your vow...

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "That voice... so warm and sweet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That voice... so warm and sweet...

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "You used to believe you came from a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You used to believe you came from a large family with many half-brothers and sisters, but where are they now? However you shout, they can't hear you...

fields.Title: Endurance: "There's a lever in front of you. Pu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a lever in front of you. Pull it, and atomic fire blankets your beloved Revachol. Millions die in an instant. But you are spared. You, and the voice in the payphone.

fields.Title: You: "Face yourself."
fields.Dialogue Text: Face yourself.
fields.variable8: (HasHat() == false  and  HasNecktie() == false  and  HasShirt() == false  and  HasJacket() == false  and  HasPants() == false  and  HasShoes() == false)
fields.variable9: HasJacket() == false  and  HasShirt() == false  and  HasPants() == false

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.face_yourself"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.face_yourself_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.face_yourself_canceled"] == false

fields.Title: Mirror: "A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall. In it -- your face, a regular, clean-shaven police officer.

fields.Title: Mirror: "An old mirror hangs on the wall. Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An old mirror hangs on the wall. You see the reflection of your face in it -- adorned with *The Expression*.

fields.Title: You: "[Better not to know -- Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Better not to know -- Leave.]

fields.Title: You: "I'm scared. I want to stop doing th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm scared. I want to stop doing this.

fields.Title: Mirror: "You should check yourself for a pul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should check yourself for a pulse, superstar. From here it looks like a cadaverous spasm.

fields.Title: Mirror: "That's right! Not even yourself. Go..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's right! Not even yourself. Go ahead, try something, it's not an order.

fields.Title: You: "Goddamnit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Goddamnit...

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "This is a horrible allegory for......"
fields.Dialogue Text: This is a horrible allegory for... whatever is on the other end.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Face it, br√∂ther. No one's got the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Face it, br√∂ther. No one's got the *willpower* to build her up again. They won't do what has to be done.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "An involuntary twitch runs through..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An involuntary twitch runs through your hand, almost like reflex.

fields.Title: Endurance: "The bloated whores, schizophrenic a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bloated whores, schizophrenic anarchists and deformed moneylenders tremble, trying to shield their eyes, as he -- *Le gendarme en diamant* -- walks by!

fields.Title: Endurance: "*All* of it."
fields.Dialogue Text: *All* of it.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Have you really been wearing that d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Have you really been wearing that decadent homo-sexual grin this whole time? It's disgusting. No wonder you haven't been able to *truly face yourself*.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Now, every night, while you masturb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now, every night, while you masturbate in the ruins of your not-so-great-anymore hall, they're getting pleasured by foreign men with superior testosterone levels and *far* more advanced sexual practices than your feeble grunt-and-thrust.

fields.Title: You: "I did not."
fields.Dialogue Text: I did not.

fields.Title: Mirror: "The bathroom mirror has been wiped..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bathroom mirror has been wiped completely clean. You see the reflection of your face in the mirror -- even now adorned with *The Expression*.

fields.Title: Mirror: "Where to even begin? There's the bl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Where to even begin? There's the bloatedness, then the swollenness... It's like there's an upholstery of alcohol underneath your skin.

fields.Title: You: "I think it's supposed to look *sugg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I think it's supposed to look *suggestive*. I'm afraid it's meant *for the ladies*.

fields.Title: You: "No. (Keep making the face.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: No. (Keep making the face.)

fields.Title: Mirror: "Good call. Go ahead and try somethi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good call. Go ahead and try something, if you like. Or -- you know -- stop staring into the mirror.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Some twenty odd years. There is a v..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Some twenty odd years. There is a vast ocean of time between right now and *The Expression* looking good on you -- or anyone. Humanity has run aground in that time, it's a different world now. The Expression is a relic.

fields.Title: Mirror: "No. That would be too insane."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. That would be too insane.

fields.Title: Mirror: "Oh my god, you're right! It's like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh my god, you're right! It's like it's not even voluntary anymore. You have worn that grin into your face and now it won't come *off*...

fields.Title: Authority: "This is the face worn by the first..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is the face worn by the first law-bringers, the noble tyrants. Today you join their number...

fields.Title: Composure: "*Ahem*. It's a *lot* like the face..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Ahem*. It's a *lot* like the face a certain muscle-man is making on that t-shirt you insist on carrying around...

fields.Title: You: "How dare you speak of Revachol that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How dare you speak of Revachol that way...

fields.Title: Endurance: "Yes... you truly are. (Tightness --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes... you truly are. (Tightness -- in gaseous form -- leaves your body.) She's lucky to have you, watching her sleep.

fields.Title: You: "What happens to me then?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What happens to me then?

fields.Title: You: "I won't give up. I *can't* give up."
fields.Dialogue Text: I won't give up. I *can't* give up.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Look at yourself: You go about with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at yourself: You go about with this mopey look on your face like a dog who's been beaten with an old stick.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Your hands, however skilful, can't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your hands, however skilful, can't manage this task on their own. You should get your chaincutters out.

fields.Title: You: "Okay. (Try to stop.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay. (Try to stop.)

fields.Title: You: "No, this is what superstars do. (Ke..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, this is what superstars do. (Keep making the face.)

fields.Title: Mirror: "You should check yourself for a pul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should check yourself for a pulse, because from here it looks like a cadaverous spasm.

fields.Title: You: "This is the face of a late-stage al..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is the face of a late-stage alcoholic.

fields.Title: Mirror: "Getting clever appears to make *The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Getting clever appears to make *The Expression* even worse. Now it's mixed with smugness.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Still not happening. It won't come..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Still not happening. It won't come off that easy.

fields.Title: Mirror: "Suddenly you realise you have no me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Suddenly you realise you have no memory of the face that awaits you there, underneath the soft vapour.

fields.Title: You: "I have no idea why it's there. It j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I have no idea why it's there. It just is.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Remember: Kingsmen are not born, th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Remember: Kingsmen are not born, they are made. And the only thing that can unmake us is that which drove us to rise above in the first place. We keep that thing locked in the deepest cellars of our mind. So deep we forget what it is.

fields.Title: You: "I will never forsake my v√∂ws. (Conc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I will never forsake my v√∂ws. (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Endurance: "You're a hard motherfucker... (Tigh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're a hard motherfucker... (Tightness -- in gaseous form -- leaves your body.) If we didn't know better, we'd say you *enjoyed* consigning your city to the flames.

fields.Title: You: "Oh no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh no...

fields.Title: Endurance: "What was *that*? Did you just *flin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What was *that*? Did you just *flinch* before your own reflection?

fields.Title: You: "I'm insinuating that I'm vaguely sy..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm insinuating that I'm vaguely sympathetic. I think I'm sort of pulling it off too -- in a *sad has-been* kind of way. There is some charm to it.

fields.Title: Mirror: "You have no idea who this *thing* i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You have no idea who this *thing* is, do you?

fields.Title: You: "I guess that's it then. (Conclude.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: I guess that's it then. (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Composure: "*Ahem*. It's a *lot* like the face..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Ahem*. It's a *lot* like the face on that rather unfortunate muscle-man t-shirt you just so happen to be wearing...

fields.Title: You: "I don't think I can do that."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't think I can do that.

fields.Title: You: "Accept your fate with quiet resigna..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Accept your fate with quiet resignation.

fields.Title: Mirror: "An old mirror hangs on the wall. Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An old mirror hangs on the wall. You see your reflection in it -- *The Expression* fixed to your clean-shaven face. You're still not accustomed to it.

fields.Title: Mirror: "Hot water sprays from the base and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hot water sprays from the base and steam covers the mirror. You cannot see yourself, just the outline of a man.
fields.Alternate1: Hot water sprays from the faucet's base and steam covers the mirror. You cannot see yourself, just a vague impression of a man.

fields.Title: You: "What? What's wrong?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What? What's wrong?

fields.Title: You: "At least my tongue is okay. (Touch..."
fields.Dialogue Text: At least my tongue is okay. (Touch your tongue.)

fields.Title: You: "Wipe the mirror now."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wipe the mirror now.

fields.Title: Mirror: "You step back from the mirror. A lo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You step back from the mirror. A loose board creaks.

fields.Title: Volition: "Does this thing *unmake* you, or do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Does this thing *unmake* you, or does it heal you?

fields.Title: Endurance: "So ask yourself, when the time come..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So ask yourself, when the time comes, can you shoot the past in the head, walk away, and never look back on its rotting remains?

fields.Title: Endurance: "It's time. Time to see yourself as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's time. Time to see yourself as you truly are. It's going to be absolutely *devastating*, but there's no way to avoid it.

fields.Title: You: "No, not the stores..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, not the stores...

fields.Title: Endurance: "And that doesn't even *begin* to co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And that doesn't even *begin* to cover what's happened to your w√∂men...

fields.Title: You: "Use your chaincutters to fix the fa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Use your chaincutters to fix the faucet. Stop steam from fogging up the mirror.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "The chaincutters slip out of your h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The chaincutters slip out of your hands as you attempt to twist the faucet into place. Well, you know one thing for sure -- you've probably never been a plumber.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Just like that it's over -- the run..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just like that it's over -- the running gag that your life had become. A sad old man looks back at you.

fields.Title: Mirror: "A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall. It's barely covered in steam anymore. You see your face, such as it is. A regular, clean-shaven police officer.

fields.Title: Mirror: "A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall. In it -- your face, now without *The Expression*. It's just hairy.

fields.Title: You: "I promise. (Lie.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: I promise. (Lie.)

fields.Title: Mirror: "A mirror hangs on the wall, covered..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A mirror hangs on the wall, covered in steam. You cannot see yourself, just the outlines of a man. You have no memory of the face that awaits you there, underneath the soft vapour.

fields.Title: Mirror: "A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall. In it -- your face, adorned with *The Expression*.

fields.Title: You: "So I adopted it? Why?"
fields.Dialogue Text: So I adopted it? Why?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "There is a vast ocean of time betwe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is a vast ocean of time between right now and *The Expression* looking good on you -- or anyone. Two decades, if the calendar is to be trusted. Humanity has run aground in that time, it's a different world now. The Expression is a relic.

fields.Title: You: "If I can't stop, I wouldn't want to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If I can't stop, I wouldn't want to know. Better to just keep making it.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "*Ahem*. It's *very* similar to the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Ahem*. It's *very* similar to the face Hjelmdallermann is always making on the cover of those books...

fields.Title: You: "You're wrong. There's still a way t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're wrong. There's still a way to turn back time. To make things *richtig*.

fields.Title: Mirror: "You step back from the mirror. A be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You step back from the mirror. A bead of water drips from the pipe beneath the washbasin.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Nine million souls flicker out of e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nine million souls flicker out of existence. Sixteen if you include the greater metropolitan area.

fields.Title: Endurance: "You're tired, afraid, sad, hungry a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're tired, afraid, sad, hungry and in pain. But most of all: confused. Yet *still*, like a tiny icebreaker -- the tiniest boat in the fleet -- you plough ever forward...

fields.Title: Endurance: "That stupid *Expression* was your l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That stupid *Expression* was your last line of defence, but now even that has collapsed. The combined armies of Pain and Shit are streaming through your gates, pillaging your stores, carrying off your w√∂men...

fields.Title: Endurance: "You've let your guard down. Now the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've let your guard down. Now the combined armies of Pain and Shit are streaming through your gates, pillaging your stores, carrying off your w√∂men...

fields.Title: Endurance: "You don't even have anything to say..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You don't even have anything to say for yourself, do you? Just gonna take it all lying down? Why not grab your ankles while you're at it? That's why you never stood a chance.

fields.Title: Mirror: "A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall. In it -- your clean-shaven face, adorned with *The Expression*. You're still not accustomed to it.

fields.Title: Mirror: "Bet you are. Your nose feels like a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Bet you are. Your nose feels like a small balloon in the middle of your face. It hurts when you honk it, and it doesn't appear to be a particularly tiny nose either. Not with all the drinks it's *absorbed* for you.
fields.Alternate1: It's not, your nose feels like a balloon in the middle of your face. It hurts when you honk it -- doesn't appear to be a particularly small nose either. Not with all the drinks it's *absorbed* for you.

fields.Title: You: "Dear lord help me, what is this?!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Dear lord help me, what is this?!

fields.Title: Mirror: "Please stop, it's horrible! You're..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Please stop, it's horrible! You're scaring yourself.

fields.Title: Mirror: "Really -- all recollection of the p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Really -- all recollection of the person you are, the people in your life and even the world you're in has drowned in a sea of blood alcohol. This was no mere night of drinking, it was a deluge. Of world-ending proportions.

fields.Title: You: "I don't want to know."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't want to know.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Everyone loved it. Maybe you though..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Everyone loved it. Maybe you thought some of the stardust would rub off on you? Maybe it did? Either way, it's all gone now. Only the grimace remains.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Not really. OO must have just stirr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not really. OO must have just stirred your mind. They're more like a disco rock band anyway...

fields.Title: You: "Will I ever be able to make another..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Will I ever be able to make another face again?

fields.Title: Endurance: "It's time you knew the truth, br√∂th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's time you knew the truth, br√∂ther.

fields.Title: Endurance: "It can, and it *is*. Just a mountai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It can, and it *is*. Just a mountain of shit, every bit of it.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "In a mould-covered bathroom inside..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In a mould-covered bathroom inside a trashed hostel near the edge of Martinaise, a middle-aged man grips the sides of a cold sink in white-knuckled fury...

fields.Title: Endurance: "Your heart can belong to Revachol o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your heart can belong to Revachol or it can belong to darkness. As long as it's torn between them it's broken and useless.

fields.Title: Endurance: "*Nothing* -- not pain, fatigue, hun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Nothing* -- not pain, fatigue, hunger, fear or desire -- will ever deviate you from the path. Like an icebreaker you crush all opposition, ploughing forward *no matter what it takes*.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Yes, you did. There's no use denyin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, you did. There's no use denying it...

fields.Title: Mirror: "The mirror begins to clear slowly w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The mirror begins to clear slowly without you having to wipe it.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Told you that you *needed* those ch..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Told you that you *needed* those chaincutters. Everything is connected. Everything has a purpose.

fields.Title: Mirror: "A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall. It's barely covered in steam anymore. You see your face, such as it is without *The Expression*. It's just hairy.

fields.Title: Mirror: "Yeah, there is definitely something..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, there is definitely something wrong with it.

fields.Title: Mirror: "You are correct."
fields.Dialogue Text: You are correct.

fields.Title: You: "[Let the mirror be for now.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Let the mirror be for now.]

fields.Title: You: "No one tells me what to do."
fields.Dialogue Text: No one tells me what to do.

fields.Title: Mirror: "As you slowly reach your hand towar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you slowly reach your hand toward the surface of the mirror...

fields.Title: Volition: "Maybe it will make you temptation-p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe it will make you temptation-proof, so something good will come out of this at least?

fields.Title: Endurance: "You haven't yet banished all weakne..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You haven't yet banished all weakness, but you will. We know you will...

fields.Title: You: "(Rack the imaginary shotgun.) Whate..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Rack the imaginary shotgun.) Whatever it takes. For *Revachol*.

fields.Title: You: "How do I know I'm a true kingsman?"
fields.Dialogue Text: How do I know I'm a true kingsman?

fields.Title: You: "But I was trying so hard! I was mak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But I was trying so hard! I was making progress!

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Told you that you *needed* those ch..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Told you that you *needed* those chaincutters. Everything is connected. Everything has a purpose.

fields.Title: You: "I'm sorry. (Touch your nose.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm sorry. (Touch your nose.)
fields.Alternate1: I'm sure everything is fine. (Touch your nose.)

fields.Title: You: "Superstardom."
fields.Dialogue Text: Superstardom.

fields.Title: Mirror: "There might have been. Ten years ag..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There might have been. Ten years ago. It's little more than a cadaverous spasm now.

fields.Title: You: "Check for pulse."
fields.Dialogue Text: Check for pulse.

fields.Title: You: "I don't need to. I almost died tryi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't need to. I almost died trying to get that tie, but I heard my heart beat.

fields.Title: Mirror: "You should check yourself for a pul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should check yourself for a pulse, superstar. From here it looks like a cadaverous spasm.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "That's one way of saying that the n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's one way of saying that the nerve damage is *quite* severe. The only way you'll be able to change your face now is with your fingers...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "You are a terror even to yourself!"
fields.Dialogue Text: You are a terror even to yourself!

fields.Title: You: "Wait, can Kim be in the aerostatic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, can Kim be in the aerostatic too?

fields.Title: Endurance: "Oh yes, they're all *wiped out*. Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh yes, they're all *wiped out*. Your bushels of grain, your salted meats, your hogsheads brimming with bitter ale. All gone. Your fields have been put to the torch, your great-hall is a ravaged husk. You are bereft.

fields.Title: You: "God, does it have to be so awful?"
fields.Dialogue Text: God, does it have to be so awful?

fields.Title: You: "I'm not making it, the face is maki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm not making it, the face is making it itself.

fields.Title: Mirror: "Please promise yourself you are not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Please promise yourself you are not going to try it on any of the *ladies*, whatever happens.

fields.Title: You: "Dig deep into your mind to locate t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Dig deep into your mind to locate the source of *The Expression*.
fields.tooltip2: Joyce told you about The New.

fields.Title: Mirror: "You find no sign of life on your sw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You find no sign of life on your swollen neck. However, putting your hand on your chest reveals an irregular heartbeat. You appear to be alive -- for now.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Like the rest of you, it comes from..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Like the rest of you, it comes from a bad place somewhere in the past. That's all you know for now.

fields.Title: You: "I feel the need to add a clicking s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I feel the need to add a clicking sound when I make it: *Click-click*.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "With all the synapses you extinguis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With all the synapses you extinguished, it's a miracle you can even think this sentence. You've interrupted a true act of self-annulment here.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Especially love, br√∂ther. Face it,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Especially love, br√∂ther. Face it, no one's willing to make the sacrifices that are necessary, not in this day and age.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Look deep inside yourself. You know..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look deep inside yourself. You know it's true, because it *hurts*.

fields.Title: Endurance: "You will be free to love Revachol l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You will be free to love Revachol like no one has ever loved her. You will be her champion, and she will be *faithful* to you. If you can just make this last sacrifice, you will *finally* know happiness.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "He sighs and returns to his crosswo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He sighs and returns to his crossword. He is a police officer, not a baby-sitter.

fields.Title: You: "I will bear any burthen."
fields.Dialogue Text: I will bear any burthen.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Oh yes, they're all gone. Carried o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh yes, they're all gone. Carried off by foreign invaders because you failed to uphold your most ancient and noble v√∂ws. The worst part is they might even *prefer* it this way...

fields.Title: Mirror: "An old mirror hangs on the wall, ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An old mirror hangs on the wall, half-covered in shadows. You cannot see yourself fully, just the outline of a man. You have no memory of the face that awaits you there.

fields.Title: Mirror: "An old mirror hangs on the wall. Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An old mirror hangs on the wall. You see the reflection of your face in it -- such as it is. A regular clean-shaven police officer.

fields.Title: Mirror: "Don't be scared. It's only your fac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't be scared. It's only your face. It's not like anyone is going to *see* it.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Things were good. It was *smooth sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Things were good. It was *smooth sailing*. People made gold-and-champagne-tinted interiors and fa√ßades to suit the times, calling this *The New Style*. But, more importantly -- disco happened.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "For Revachol -- your city -- that m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: For Revachol -- your city -- that meant only one thing: Guillaume Le Million!
fields.Alternate1: Forget about Ostentatious Orchestrations. For Revachol -- your city -- that meant only one thing: Guillaume Le Million!

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "You have some understanding of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You have some understanding of the near history of disco, plus the trivia you've picked up along the way. Episodic memory, however, remains in the dark. It may never return. You should prepare yourself for that.

fields.Title: You: "I can try to. (Try to stop.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: I can try to. (Try to stop.)

fields.Title: Endurance: "What's that? Can't hear yourself ov..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What's that? Can't hear yourself over the moans of your w√∂men in the hands of foreigners who play them like instruments. Be careful, or they'll wear you like a sock, Harry-boy.

fields.Title: Shivers: "From above the Bay of Revachol, a c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: From above the Bay of Revachol, a cold wind gathers in response. The people of the fishing village pull their coats and blankets tight about themselves...

fields.Title: Endurance: "A day will come when you need to ta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A day will come when you need to take a shotgun to that cellar, shoot whatever is down there in the head, and walk away, never looking back.

fields.Title: Endurance: "It was time to banish that pitiful,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It was time to banish that pitiful, *sad* look from your face -- and replace it with a perfect reflection of your unyielding resolve, your noble suffering.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Meanwhile, his colleague is filling..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Meanwhile, his colleague is filling in the last clues of his nightly crossword when he hears what seems to be some kind of animalistic howling from the adjoining room. He directs his eyes toward the door of their shared bathroom...

fields.Title: Mirror: "The bathroom mirror has been wiped..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bathroom mirror has been wiped completely clean. You see the reflection of your face in the mirror -- such as it is. A regular, clean-shaven police officer.

fields.Title: Mirror: "The bathroom mirror has been wiped..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bathroom mirror has been wiped completely clean. You see the reflection of yourself in the mirror -- *The Expression* fixed to your clean-shaven face. You're still not accustomed to it.

fields.Title: Mirror: "A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall. It's barely covered in steam anymore. It's your face in the mirror -- adorned with *The Expression*.
